snippet.title: Swift: YouTube - How to Display Video Player Controls (Ep 17)
snippet.description:
Welcome back. In today's video, I'll go over how to create an overlay view that contains various control components for our video player.  The first component we'll render is a spinning loader also known as a UIActivityIndicatorView.  We'll then add a pause/play button that controls the playback of the currently loaded video.  Next video, we'll take a look at video length and scrubbing through its contents.

Completed Source Code
